1.content:
Driving down the ocean side highway, trying to go just fast enough so the police wont pull you over, you look at the clock and see it's already 8:13 in the evening. Alex and Kate wanted to throw one last summer party before the school year started. It would be the last time they could all get together, seeing as Amber and Dave would have to get back into their dorms for orientation, Jennifer would be going back and teaching the ungrateful high school students for another year and even Kevin might be starting a teaching job he was offered by the local college after his and Jessica's newest breakthrough on a chemical that would grow hair 30% thicker

Damn! You yell to yourself.

I can't believe i'm late, again.

There was nothing you could do about it, you had a deadline to meet and you were the only employee who actually cared to get it done. You always seemed to be the one pulling all the weight or helping others out. It was just in your nature, which led to a life of stress and having hardly any time for being social. Which is why you were annoyed that you were late to the party. It was the one time you could cut loose, and just enjoy yourself.

The possibility of watching your friends go wild was just an added bonus. Kate getting drunk and hitting on every guy their, much to the dismay of Alex. One time she even started giving you a lap dance in a bar.

Recalling the stool you were sitting on your elbows laying across the bar, smirking as Alex and Kate were getting into one of their classic arguments, Alex saying something about being far to "friendly" brushing her body against other men and women on the dance floor. I mean she was wearing a pretty tight red dress, where the neckline went all the way down to the underside of her ample bust and the thigh high slit showing off her well toned legs.

She got so mad at Alex she simply walked over to me, kissed me on the neck,her silky brown hair caressing my face and started grinding her breasts up and down my torso. This of course led to a variety of responses. Alex dragged her off as Amber and Dave laughed hysterically. Amber more so noticing my bodies involuntary response to having a pair of double D's pressed against me.

Amber quickly coming over and offering to "help" me with my situation, winking rather playfully as she tried to contain her laughter. Amber was quite open with her flirting and open to swinging with several guys, even while Dave was around so I had no idea at the time what she meant, as she turned around and said "want me to sit on it" she said with a smirk, now not that I was opposed to it, because even though she was quite thin she still have a very well rounded backside...I had half a mind to grab her small shoulders and go with what she seemed to be offering, which is when we were both snapped out of our fun by Jessica.

She was always the serious one, even in that bar while everyone else was dancing,in skimpy or barely dressed outfits, she clad herself in a loose sweater and jeans. She was a bit irked at the whole display between me and Amber and before Kate. Half wanting to maybe to join and half out of hearing her husband brag about *his* new breakthrough in plant growth stimulation. After breaking me and amber apart she went back to sit with her husband Jennifer and Craig. I could not help but watch her walk away and enjoy the view, I mean sure she always covered herself rather well, but you could tell even with her, as she described it, average build, she was quite good looking.

You simply kept watching that night Alex and kate getting into another argument, Amber and Dave practically having sex in the booth Jessica having to restrain herself as Kevin droned on and on about his accomplishment. While Craig was trying to finish up paperwork, and Jennifer was trying to coax him into dancing all night, unsuccessfully.

I decided to be a little help towards Jennifer and offered to go out on the dance floor. A bit annoyed with Craig she sighed and walked out with me and we started to dance, rather embarrassingly on my part, which made Jennifer giggle as she too just bopped around, her body jiggling to the beat.Only once looking back over at Craig who still had his head buried in legal documents. I think he's no longer interested in me she said with a slight frown....I think it's because I put on weight since we got married, what do you think?

Now as any well mannered male with an ounce of common sense would know, you never bring up a woman's weight or even comment on it, I mean granted Jennifer was not as slim as Amber, or hourglass shaped like Kate, but she was by no means obese, but she did have a few extra pounds...I simply answered the only way I could...Nah that's not it at all.

My pleasant stroll down memory lane was quickly halted as I made the turn down the road which Alex's manor was on. I kept thinking about all the fun I had already missed being more than 2 hours late.

Kate probably was already drunk and laying into anyone she could
Jessica already annoyed with Kevin's stories about how brilliant *his* breakthroughs were
Amber and Dave...doing each other
and Jennifer sitting alone while he workaholic husband had his nose in paperwork

I pulled up to the daunting house, just looking at a place that big was overwhelming, decorative balconies adorned each of the three main floors with the roof slanted in for the attic and at the top a widows walk which looked out over the ocean and I noticed a something strange...it was quiet. Usually there would be music blaring at one of our events. I shrugged my shoulders and rang the doorbell. Musical chimes sang out to announce my presence, followed by a clambering of feet down a staircase and across the floor, female voices chattering to each other incoherently.

Finally Kate's voice rang out "come in"

I opened the door and was surprised to see only the girls standing in the large marble floored foyer, two rounded staircases leading to the second floor with a living parlor room with a solid oak bar behind the women, It was always a sight seeing this place, but what caught my eye next was just odd.

Kate Jessica Jennifer and Amber all dressed in rather varied attire. Kate wearing the very red dress she had on in the bar that night...I felt my blood rushing to my head at the mere recall, so I quickly averted my head to Jessica who was wearing a thick cotton robe with the sash undone, her hair dripping wet. Amber was wearing what looked like a child's get up a tight tie dye shirt and cut off jeans, which barely held in her ass, and even though her breasts were smaller, you could tell with the tight shirt she was not currently wearing a bra, and for some reason she was squirming around and giggling as though she was being tickled. You let out a cough which was just to clear your throat and you look at Jennifer who was wearing a skimpy maid outfit.

Um...so was this a costume party? was the first thing you let out seeing everyone's get up, followed by

where are the guys?

You looked to the women all smirking at each other giggling almost maniacally under their breath. and Kate abruptly answered.

Well, we are in the middle of the game, each of us are dressed as our character.

and the guys? I quickly interrupted.

Kate, motioning to Jennifer, as she went back to the bar retrieving a tray with different colored drinks in shot glasses on it.

Let's just say, some of them already lost, Kate said gloatingly

and some of them are still in the game, Amber exclaimed in between a giggle and her squirming

Rather unsatisfied with that answer I simply ignored the absence of the other's for now, after all I was already late so I had no idea what could have happened in those two hours, for all I knew the guys were out back sulking that they lost. So how does the game work?I asked

As Jenifer came over with the tray, standing right next to me I saw four different colored drinks a red, blue, green, black and clear one, as Kate explained the rules. Basically as your character you have path to either win the game....or lose, along the way you will be given multiple choices to which you have to decide between, most of which will end badly for you.

Seems rather vague, I interrupted

Kate, with a seductive glance and a hint of sexual desire in her voice simply stated. Don't worry, there will be plenty of hints along the way, and opportunities to make up for any mistakes.

I look back at the drinks and Jennifer holding them as though offering me one I pick up the ________ one and quickly drink it, looking back at Kate and saying

So where is my costume and when do we begin.

all the women in unison, smiled and everyone but Kate started walking away, who was walking toward me, as I started feeling a bit dizzy.

Well, the game has already started, and....you don't need a costume, is all I heard Kate say before I lost my balance and fell to the floor.

what was in that.....was all I could get out before I blacked out. needless to say I had no idea that I had already made my first choice.
1.title: Running late, the party begins.

choices: you went strait, to Kate at the Bar.
first left, Jessica in the bathtub
second left, Amber in the Play room
11.content:
You slowly come to, feeling like you just woke up from an extended night of heavy drinking. The first thing you notice is the lack of light, you can barely see anything as your eyes start to adjust to the darkness. You soon make out what seems to be a metal ceiling, and then the walls and then the metal floor.Still coming to, you feel a slight chill in the air and stand up noticing that you are completely naked.

What the hell!!!

You knew that being stripped naked was not the oddest thing in the world for your friends to do, but this was the first time you had not woken up with at least one of them around when it happened. Slowly you get to your feet as your eyes begin to adjust a bit more, you can make out the ground which is covered in thick dust. You've been to this house plenty of times and have never seen this room, or any room like it. It was perfectly square and long, and you could not see the end of it.

Looking around you see a large square yellow paper laying in the middle of the room and you can't believe the amount of dust gathered on the ground, like no one has been in this room in years, looking closer, you see prints in the dust, footprints. one that is the same size as you but others that are several times smaller.

The other guys?

You question yourself, thinking that there is no way anyone has feet that much smaller than you.

probably an animal or something, you reason.

You turn your attention back to the large paper, the writing is quite large, each letter almost the size of your hand, but in Kate's handwriting. It reads.

You have a choice of four paths ahead, better hurry before it's decided for you.

Decided for me? What does that mean?

Well I guess I better go along with the game.

You start down the large square hall, keeping your eye's on the footprints already made in the thick dust, the fact that their is only one that seems to be actual foot prints unsettles you, I mean those others can't possibly be from anyone here. You continue you walk and you see another large note in the distance, you quickly jog to it and see that it's just four arrows two pointing left, one pointing right and on ahead, looking around you can see corridors to where each of the arrows are pointing. two of the smaller prints went to the right, one went to the first left and the last one the same size prints went to the 2nd left with no prints going toward the one strait ahead

Well I guess I'll choose the ______________

As you make your way down the path, you feel a slight chill in the air again, as a slight breeze starts to waft over you

That's weird, where would a breeze be coming from?

The breeze starts to grow stronger

What in the world!!!!

the blast of air picks you up and tumbles you down the hall, unable to regain control you spiral forward like a leaf in the wind, seeing daylight ahead and a large slatted grate coming into view, you nervously flail as you see the grate coming closer and try to avoid hitting it.

Mercifully, the gust of wind stops and you somewhat harmlessly land back on the metal ground, near the opening. Quickly dusting yourself off and slipping through the slats to get out of this death trap, you are temporarily blinded by the bright light, as your eyes adjust...and you wish that they had not as you look around and see a normal room, but much much larger than normal....you come to understand the metal hallway you just exited was the heat vent, and that burst of air was filtration system turning on.

This can't be, this has to be some sort of trick

A familiar voice from above chimes "it's no trick'

you cover your ears at the booming noise, sounding like it's blasting on a surround sound speaker system, you look up an a sudden terror come over you, as you are standing near a giant.....
11.title: Red (6 inches)

choices: Strait to Kate at the bar
12.content:
You slowly come to, feeling like you just woke up from an extended night of heavy drinking. The first thing you notice is the lack of light, you can barely see anything as your eyes start to adjust to the darkness. You soon make out what seems to be a metal ceiling, and then the walls and then the metal floor.Still coming to, you feel a slight chill in the air and stand up noticing that you are completely naked.

What the hell!!!

You knew that being stripped naked was not the oddest thing in the world for your friends to do, but this was the first time you had not woken up with at least one of them around when it happened. One that is twice the size of your own feet, two that are the same size and one that looks half the size of your own

The other guys?

You question yourself, thinking that there is no way anyone has feet that much bigger or smaller than you

probably an animal or something, you reason.

You turn your attention back to the large paper, the writing is quite large, each letter almost the size of your head, but in Kate's handwriting. It reads.

You have a choice of four paths ahead, better hurry before it's decided for you.

Decided for me? What does that mean?

Well I guess I better go along with the game.

You start down the large square hall, keeping your eye's on the footprints already made in the thick dust, the fact that their is only one that seems to be actual foot prints unsettles you, I mean those others can't possibly be from anyone here. You continue you walk and you see another large note in the distance, you quickly jog to it and see that it's just four arrows two pointing left, one pointing right and on ahead, looking around you can see corridors to where each of the arrows are pointing. two of the same size prints went to the right, one went to the first left and the last one the larger size prints went to the 2nd left with no prints going toward the one strait ahead

Well I guess I'll choose the ______________

As you make your way down the path, you feel a slight chill in the air again, as a slight breeze starts to waft over you

The breeze starts to grow stronger

What in the world!!!!

the blast of air picks you up and tumbles you down the hall, unable to regain control you spiral forward like a leaf in the wind, seeing daylight ahead and a large slatted grate coming into view, you nervously flail as you see the grate coming closer and try to avoid hitting it.

This can't be, this has to be some sort of trick

A familiar voice from above chimes "it's no trick'

you cover your ears at the booming noise, sounding like it's blasting on a surround sound speaker system, you look up an a sudden terror come over you, as you are standing near a giant.....
12.title: Blue (3 inches)

choices: Go along and play the game.
121.content:
Looking up, taking in the vast wall of red covering sensual curves.

Stopping for a moment, to catch a glimpse of the largest pair of breasts that you not only have ever seen, but ever even imagined. barely enclosed by the very low neckline, both heaving up and down with each breath that woman they were attached to took. Feeling the blood rushing to your head and are immediately taken out of your trance by the booming voice from above.

Hey!! My eyes are up here little man.

Jerking your head up, somewhat embarrassed at your prolonged staring at the large amounts of exposed female flesh. Seeing Kate's looming face staring down at your nude body. A smirk goes across her face as jingles a small glass of ice and the remnants of a drink.

Quickly regaining some composure, covering yourself, and stand to your feet, not knowing what to say. Looking around you, seeing that you are standing on a long wooden mass, with a drop off on either side, the strong smell of alcohol surround you, looking past Kate, to see a billiards table, coming quickly to the understanding that you are standing on top of the bar. Your observations being interrupted momentarily by Kate moving her massive arm, looking more like a crane, setting the glass she was holding down on the bar next to you.You instinctively jumping out of the way and a bit frustrated at Kate's lack of care. While picking yourself up, you hear her voice from above one more.

I was wondering If I would ever get to participate in the game.

Game!!!! you shout back.
What the hell is going on here!!! Where is everyone else!!!and why are you so damn huge!!!

Her eyes narrow, and a smile once more comes back to her face, she slowly leans in, causing you to take a few steps back, as her face quickly comes closer, her breasts pressing against the wooden surface just feet from you, feeling the heat radiating from her body, the subtle smell of alcohol on her breath, it wafts over you like a warm breeze. You had not really realized till now the immense size difference between you, maybe out of shock or maybe simply out of being overwhelmed that you have one of having hot air balloon size breasts looming nearby. Swallowing hard rethinking for a moment yelling like that, as you see Kate's hand soaring over to you, a single finger nearly the same size as your whole body, juts out toward you and gently pokes you in the stomach, as Kate slowly runs her massive digit up and down your torso.

Softly Kate starts speaking

This is the game sweety, as I told you before you will be given multiple choices to move through the game, your first choice was which drink you took, to determine what size you shrank down to.

hearing those words you now understood that those other footprints in the heat vent were indeed those of the other guys and that it was you that got smaller.

Kate continued.
The way the game works, is that you will have to decide between multiple choices that are given to you along the way.Your choices will determine your fellow characters responses. If you manage to choose correctly,and pass each stage, you'll win and reach the antidote in the attic, and don't worry, even though there are many ways to lose in this game for you, you can always get out of a jam with a hint

pressing her opposite hand against her face to try and cover up a small laugh

But those hints will cost you.

Slightly worried about what losing this game would mean.

Where are the other guys?

Kate's smile turned into a bit of a scoff as she took her finger away from your chest and leaned back up, hearing the clicking of her shoes over the edge of the bar as she stood up, the wall of red dress rising into the air and her face partially becoming obstructed by her chest. she stepped back and motioned down to where she was sitting. Taking another large gulp, fearing what I would see, I slowly step to the edge, the rim of the stool she was sitting in coming into view, a few more steps closer and I saw it, the unmistakable red smear of a body that had been crushed.

My eyes widened, the horror and shock shooting through my body as a hundred thoughts went blazing through my head.

That, was Alex.....he chose incorrectly. she said rather coldly.

Falling backward onto the bar, not only had you just learned that one of your best friends had died, but that your own life was in extreme peril. Overwhelmed with anger grief and terror, the only thing you could muster to ask was. Why?

Because we were sick of our husbands, kate interjected.

Alex, always trying to cage me in, Kevin always taking credit for Jessica's work, Jennifer wanting some excitement and to not constantly be ignored...and well, Amber just thought it would be kinky. We could no longer take the rut we all were in, we wanted out and...we figured why not have a little fun while doing it. So when Jessica came to me and said she had developed a serum that could reduce the mass of living tissue...well, that's when we came up with the plan to have this game night. Make our men feel what it's like to be trapped belittled and hopeless!!!

Kate, took a deep breath and regained her composure

At least we gave them a chance to win-she said walking around the bar. Simply watching in amazement as her colossal figure moved so gracefully, trying not to stare as her breasts jiggled about in the revealing dress. Blushing once again along with other involuntary bodily actions. Kate taking notice as she bends over to grab a bottle of alcohol, making sure she stays at the right angle so you can get a full glimpse of her canyon of cleavage. She had always been a tease, but being a tease and being 100 times her normal size was quite overwhelming. Kate taking notice of this

I would not be too worried though,she stated as she was refilling her glass, the liquid pouring out more like a waterfall to you.

All the girls have had a thing for you,so we might be a bit more lenient with the rules.

Setting the bottle down, she grabs her glass and once more walks toward you, leaning her body over you, the shadow of her bust engulfing your entire form.

Stepping back a few feet just to be able to see Kate's face. as she purses her lips and takes a sip of her drink

I'm sure it comes as no surprise to you, that I've always found you quite attractive.

Her glaring eyes run up and down your body as her hand slips across the bar, inching it's way to you, lifting her index finger up to playfully flick your manhood

And I can see the feeling is mutual.
Feeling the lust in her words, and in your current predicament you could do nothing to stop or initiate any sort of response, you were helpless and still trying to put the last few minutes into context. You are barely 3 inches tall, in a life or death game with at least one colossal woman who could end your life in an instant. A woman who had just murdered one of your closest friends but who seems to what to play with you, in more ways than one. You could simply refuse to play along and demand the antidote right now, or you could simply see where this goes, who knows, maybe it could be fun.
121.title: Strait to Kate at the bar

1211.content:
Stepping back from Kate's teasing finger, deciding to start getting through this game.

Alright Kate, what are my first options?Trying to not have your voice crack.

With a slight frown, Kate pulls her hand away. and sets her glass down next to you. Like before with her body heat cold coming off the glass,is easily noticed and with not wearing anything, the chill is magnified.

Alright little man, your first three options with me are. A game of billiards, a dance, or a drink.

Pausing for a moment, thinking about each of theses options, a game of pool at this size would be next to impossible, the balls are as big as you are, dancing does not seem like a very hard option, I mean it's just dancing, although you could use that drink, calm your nerves a little bit, after everything you have just had to deal with.
1211.title: Go along and play the game.

choices: Go to the next stage with out the hint
Take the hint, you can dodge a few more of these balls.
12111.content:
Shrugging, not really knowing what to think about these options and just blurt out the first one.

I guess i'll go with the game of pool.

I mean you figure you'd just be rolling the balls around or something into the holes for Kate's amusement, which would be a workout but nothing you could not handle, you estimated the balls would be around 200 lbs each at your current size, but being round they would be easy to move, maybe a little difficult to maneuver, but you would eventually get them in the holes.

Kate raised an eyebrow, and let out a slightly intrigued Hmm.
Guessing she thought you would have chosen differently

Alright then, pool it is little guy. She said with a half smile.

Staring up at her, hoping you chose correctly, in the back of your head understanding that the wrong choice could mean certain death, but that half smile did give you some measure of comfort, out of the corner of your eye you saw Kate's hand, reaching over to you, rather quickly. The best way to describe what it felt like was if a giant squid was swimming at you,at immense speed tentacle ready to wrap you up. You froze still as her fingers enclosed around your body, feeling the warmth of her flesh against your own,it was both comforting and terrifying being secured, tightly in her grasp and if she were picking up a small pet.

the next sensation was not nearly as pleasant, as she lifted you into the air, you felt your feet leave the security of the ground and just dangle underneath you, as you shot up with the same feeling as an amusement park ride, trying not to get sick as you rose past her stomach and stopped eye level with her chest. She drew you close to her breasts, almost as if she was going to drop you between them, but just stopping your body a few inches short.

Hearing her let out a soft giggle as she started walking toward the pool table, her breasts reverberating with each step, mesmerized by the soft orbs bouncing around in her dress, and she knew it. She was always a tease, and knew how to use her best assets, and she was taking full advantage of your current position.

Regaining your composure, once again after being hypnotized you jolt your head up, seeing Kate staring down at you biting her lip.You once more felt a rush inside your body which was furthers by her next words.

Tell you what, if you make it past this round, i'll give you a little treat.

Your heart fluttered,feeling your face grow red, your mind racing with sensual thoughts, about what she could mean by that, mind was racing so fast you barely realized that Kate was moving her hand down and away from her body, setting your feet down on the felt surface of the pool table, her fingers releasing you from their clutch. Nearly falling over from all the vertigo, going up and down so quickly, not to mention the blood which was not flowing to your brain at the moment.Watching Kate turn away and walk to the wall where the pool cues were hanging.

It took a moment to realize that she had placed you on the pool table, the numbered balls at your back were already set up, and to your front, the cue ball, your body placed in a position that seemed to be half way in between both. Turning over to Kate to watch as she grabbed the first pool cue and start walking back to the table. smirking down at you she nonchalantly gave you a rather stark warning.

That's if you make it past the first round.

She, took the cue in hand and bent over the table, her breasts pressing together as she leaned over examining the table and lining up her breaking shot. Your eyes widened, coming to the realization that you were not going to be playing pool, so much as trying to survive it.

Wait a second!!

Kate stopped mid motion, and gave an exclamation as to say she remembered something,

My bad, she started
I didn't explain the rules.
Well, all you have to do is dodge. If you are still alive by the end of three shots, you win. Simple.

Taken aback by the casual nature of that statement but you did not have time to dwell upon it, as Kate got back into position, taking a few practice shots and then striking the cue ball, the sphere quickly baring down on you. Jumping out of the way, feeling the reverberation of the ball passing you, the sound much like that of a car passing by, landing on your stomach, Feeling as though you may have dodged a bullet.

Your momentary relief turning to panic, as a thunderous clack of the balls rang through your ears, the giant spheres being set in motion and scattering around the table, two were headed in your direction, you jump to your feet and roll out of the way of the solid yellow ball and avoid the green striped by rolling left. Your heart pounding as everything on the table stops.

So far so good, you managed to live past the break.

Kate, sounded rather impressed with that as she started walking around the table, keeping an eye down on you getting to your feet.

I have to say I'm happy that you decided to go along with the game, Alex refused to go along with it.

Kate hunched over the table once more, you could see the cue ball ball on the far side of the table from you, with several balls in between.As Kate continued to talk.

I mean, he even lucked out, landing with Jennifer to start the game. But he just refused to go along with it.

I tried to listen to Kate's words, but I was again preoccupied with trying not to die as she took her second shot, luckily the only ball that came my way fell into the side pocket with a large thud, as I breathed a sigh of relief.

Which is why I had to punish him. She paused a moment as she walked over lining up the next shot, the cue and eight ball, lined up directly aimed at where I was.

I mean don't get me wrong, I gave him plenty of opportunities to either play the game or face the penalty, but you know how me and Alex never can settle an argument until one of us walk away.

Half paying attention to Kate's words and her movements it made perfect sense that Alex would refuse to go along with this whole thing, after all her was use to being in control, or at least use to trying to control everything, including Kate, the thought of having to take orders and listen to anyone tell him what to do, must have been an annoyance to him, and in the position he was in at that moment, it's no wonder that he ended up a smear on a bar stool.

Which is exactly what you were trying to avoid becoming as kate took her last shot, the eight ball darting to the left of you, thinking you were safe, until you heard the unmistakable clack of two balls colliding, sending one barreling toward your direction. Panicking, you simply try and out run the ball, getting flashback of Indiana Jones trying to outrun a boulder, looking dead ahead at the corner pocket getting closer as you sprint away, dodging at the last second to avoid being crushed, watching the ball vanish into the hole.

Laying on the felt surface and breath a sigh of relief, knowing the task was done.Hearing a rather joyful giggle from Kate.

Congratulations, you made it through the first round.

A bit out of breath you simply look up toward Kate and give her a thumbs up, as you watch her lean over the pool table with the cue stick once more, as though she was going to take another shot.

Now then, she said with an almost sadistic tone. You have another choice to make.

Realizing you were safe...somewhat, for the moment, you stand to your feet as Kate continued.

You can either choose to move onto the next round, not knowing what you might get into, or I can give you a hint and make the next round a bit easier for you to pass, but you will have to survive more of this game.
12111.title: A game of billiards (pool)

121111.content:
Deciding not to try your luck any more on the pool table and avoid having to dodge any more of the boulder sized balls. You get to your feet and yell up to Kate .

I think I'll just move on to the next round, if that's ok.

You start to walk to the middle of the table closer to Kate, anticipating her picking you up again. she gives a slight sign of joy and happily states.

Good choice....but.

You freeze, but, is not the word you wanted to hear right now, not in a game where the wrong choice could end up getting you killed. You look up at Kate still with a smile on her face, as she set the pool cue down, which somewhat calmed your nerves for the time being. You watch as she once again, gracefully moved her tree limb of an arm, with the grace of a ballet dancer, her hand closed say for her outstretched index finger which, lightly jabbed you in the chest, Kate playfully running the tip of her finger up to your chin and forcing your head upward to look at her.

She leaned over, making sure the line of sight between where she was aiming your head was directly toward her massive cleavage As she said in a soft sensual tone.

I did promise you a little treat. Didn't I.

The one thing I had always known about Kate is, she may be a tease but eventually she will try to pay off her tantalizing torture, and now without anyone to hold her back she was not going to renege on all her seductive play. Lowering her finger down to your chest she gently pushes you onto your back pinning you for a moment against the table. as she let out a moaning

Mmmmmm, such a good easy going man, she mused.

You wont question the desires of a woman, you simply go along for the ride, and enjoy it.

You could barely see past the drops of cum, but amber's mouth opened up, inserting you inside, your entire body feeling like it was getting pulled into a vacuum as she sucked her cum off of your upper body and pulled you back out of her mouth.

Better?

She asked, to which all you could reply was a simple nod. She smiled once more and began to talk again.

Seems you made it past the first round...and now, you have another option.

Starting to regain some strength, you jolted your head up, knowing that you had to endure much more of this, before the game was over.

You can go to the next round, if you want.....or, I can give you a hint on your next round...but it's going to cost you *wink*

Having a pretty good idea of what it would cost to get that hint, you think about getting that advantage, or simply moving on.
1223.title: Hide and seek

choices: strait to Kate at the bar
2nd left to amber in the playroom
right to Jennifer cleaning in the kitchen.
13.content:
You slowly come to, feeling like you just woke up from an extended night of heavy drinking. The first thing you notice is the lack of light, you can barely see anything as your eyes start to adjust to the darkness. You soon make out what seems to be a metal ceiling, and then the walls and then the metal floor.Still coming to, you feel a slight chill in the air and stand up noticing that you are completely naked.

What the hell!!!

You knew that being stripped naked was not the oddest thing in the world for your friends to do, but this was the first time you had not woken up with at least one of them around when it happened. Slowly you get to your feet as your eyes begin to adjust a bit more, you can make out the ground which is covered in thick dust. You've been to this house plenty of times and have never seen this room, or any room like it. It was perfectly square and long, and you could not see the end of it.

Looking around you see a large square yellow paper laying, almost the size of a billboard. in the middle of the room and you can't believe the amount of dust gathered on the ground, like no one has been in this room in years, looking closer, you see prints in the dust, footprints. one that is huge, nearly as big as your whole body another not quite as big but two that are several times smaller that are the same size

The other guys?

You question yourself, thinking that there is no way anyone has feet that much bigger than you, I mean they were practically your body length

probably an animal or something, you reason.

You turn your attention back to the large paper, the writing is quite large, each letter almost half you size but in Kate's handwriting. It reads.

You have a choice of four paths ahead, better hurry before it's decided for you.

Decided for me? What does that mean?

Well I guess I better go along with the game.

You start down the large square hall, keeping your eye's on the footprints already made in the thick dust, the fact that their only only two that seem to be actual foot prints unsettles you, I mean those others can't possibly be from anyone here. You continue you walk and you see another large note in the distance, you quickly jog to it and see that it's just four arrows two pointing left, one pointing right and on ahead, looking around you can see corridors to where each of the arrows are pointing. two of the actual foot prints went to the right, one went to the first left and the last one the much bigger prints went to the 2nd left, with no prints going toward the one strait ahead

Well I guess I'll choose the ______________

As you make your way down the path, you feel a slight chill in the air again, as a slight breeze starts to waft over you

That's weird, where would a breeze be coming from?

The breeze starts to grow stronger

What in the world!!!!

the blast of air picks you up and tumbles you down the hall, unable to regain control you spiral forward like a leaf in the wind, seeing daylight ahead and a large slatted grate coming into view, you nervously flail as you see the grate coming closer and try to avoid hitting it.

Mercifully, the gust of wind stops and you somewhat harmlessly land back on the metal ground, near the opening. Quickly dusting yourself off and slipping through the slats to get out of this death trap, you are temporarily blinded by the bright light, as your eyes adjust...and you wish that they had not as you look around and see a normal room, but much much larger than normal....you come to understand the metal hallway you just exited was the heat vent, and that burst of air was filtration system turning on.

This can't be, this has to be some sort of trick

A familiar voice from above chimes "it's no trick'

you cover your ears at the booming noise, sounding like it's blasting on a surround sound speaker system, you look up an a sudden terror come over you, as you are standing near a giant.....
13.title: Green (1 inch)

info.brief_description: Invited to a dinner party, where everyone has a role to play, including your small part.
info.description:
A dinner party!? That's rather a tame get together for you and your friends. Usually you'd just go out drinking and watch as the nights drama lent itself to entertaining you. I mean being the only single guy in your group led to a few...lets say awkward situations. Being the go to guy that your drunken female friends would fawn over should they want to make their partner jealous in some way. You always knew it was in good fun, but you could not help but notice a slight seriousness in the tension, you just shrugged it off as normal couple stuff.
But a dinner party, you'd think that particular setting would be more "normal" of an occasion where you would not have to deal with any sexual tension, and everyone else had already said they were going, much to the glee of the ladies. (speaking of which, lets introduce the lovely couples)

Kate and Alex

Alex-Classic rich playboy who was nearly disowned by his parents when he was just 18 after one two many run in's with the law. You helped him make up with his family shortly before he met Kate. A year later Kate and Alex were married after a incident involving you Kate and too much alcohol. Which is right around the same time Alex's parents met with a fatal car accident, leaving Alex the sole heir to his family's 37 room mansion and South American "sugar cane" fortune.

Kate-Raised to be a "proper" lady, down to the hourglass figure, but with a raging party girl underneath. Once when she had one to many drinks she started grinding against you and making out which infuriated Alex, so much so that he announced their engagement just a week later on the promise that she remain loyal to him. Kate accepted this proposal and has been the "good wife" with an urge to break free ever since.


Jessica and Kevin

From a young age both have been brilliant chemists. But Kevin always seems to outshine Jessica, from him graduating a year earlier than Jessica (even though they were both in their late teens) to always seeming to get the credit on their joint chemistry efforts. Kevin, although brilliant seems to be oblivious to Jessica's growing resentment towards her never getting the credit due her in their joint efforts. Maybe their latest project which they have been working on the last few months will be the one where both are given equal credit.


Amber and Dave- Both on their last year of school, Amber is a bit of a ditz but her bubbly personality makes her impossible not to like. She in many ways is still a child who just wants to have fun, and her boyfriend Dave, although making his way through all his courses (barely) seems to have little to no ambition

Jennifer and Craig-A full time teacher and a small town lawyer, Jennifer wants more excitement in her life and the only time she gets anything close to that is when these get togethers happen. Craig is very buttoned up and closed off, the very definition of legalistic, in terms of everything, I mean what other person would have a life insurance policy done at the age of 19 and have a will at the age of 22.
